website_summaries.verdict: Though the Kyocera Contact is inexpensive and easy to use, there are better, more reliable prepaid phones on this network and others.
pros: Virgin Mobile's Kyocera Contact is competitively priced off-contract, has a capable camera, and can transfer media files via a USB connection
cons: The Contact's keypads have minor design flaws, call quality is poor, and glacial data speeds make Web surfing a drag

customer_reviews.title: BEST UPGRADE FOR ASSURANCE WIRELESS LIFELINE PHONES. NOT MANY ARE COMPATIBLE. THIS ONE IS
customer_reviews.text: not bad at all!!. i must say i have the assurance wireless lifeline phone and there are very few phone compatible with the Assurance/virgin mobile and the phone they give u is not only ancient but has nothing to it but text and call. no camera, no data, very poor internet options. The Kyocera Contact however, is an awesome phone. i have really big fingers and almost impossible to text but the Contact has a slide out keyboard that works great and it has a really decent camera on as well as many options the standard phone didnt have. so i reccomend this phone to anyone on Assurance wireless
customer_reviews.author: Maurice D

customer_reviews.title: Great phone
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this phone. It replaced another Kyocera phone, a very bare bones model. This phone works great, I love having the Qwerty keyboard on it (makes texting a little easier and faster) but was a little disappointed to find out that I can't transfer my own ringtones to it either through texting or by connecting it to my laptop. Still, very worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea M. Pugliese

customer_reviews.title: Bad Reception, but I didn't expect much just needed ...
customer_reviews.text: Lighted key feature burned out right away. Bad Reception, but I didn't expect much just needed to replace a lost phone quickly. Have moved on to an LG Tribute 2 Smartphone. Got a Great deal with Amazon Prime.
customer_reviews.author: Ray Gilroy

customer_reviews.title: He has big fingers so full keyboard was nice touch. He texts more often now
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a friend on goverment phone program. He has big fingers so full keyboard was nice touch. He texts more often now. Lol
customer_reviews.author: lizlemon333

customer_reviews.title: Kyocera Contact(virgin Mobile)
customer_reviews.text: Great phone, very easy to set up and use .I had a old flip phone that made texting very difficult . With this phone I love how easy it is to text .
customer_reviews.author: lucky lady

customer_reviews.title: Great for the cell phone challenged
customer_reviews.text: Works for my husband who is not technology savy. He doesn't like the touch screen phones and is happy with this one. The only problem is when you take photo's, you can't expand them or enlarge them.

customer_reviews.title: Beast Phone!!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a beuty phone!!! Mad sleek design, and extremely fast response! A Great Buy! Works with accurance wireless.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Like this phone!
customer_reviews.text: Phone works well & is not hard to use. I find keyboards easier to use than touch screens & the one on this phone has nice sized buttons.
customer_reviews.author: Mr.Sam

customer_reviews.title: I can call and text easily and that's all I want to do
customer_reviews.text: It meets my needs. I can call and text easily and that's all I want to do. I don't use a phone for data. The pictures are a joke. They are the size of a thumbnail. Maybe if I had data I could email them to my computer and view them larger, but since I don't have data there is no sense in even using the camera.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality. You can tell this phone was made ...
customer_reviews.text: It is more than I expected. Very good quality. You can tell this phone was made to go the long haul. I hate to think of ever having to replace it. Very satisfied with this purchase.

customer_reviews.title: Terrible phone!

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this phone.

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my wife. She was tired of paying the high contracts that gave her more than she needed. This works for her. She mostly texts (a lot!), so the keyboard feature is her favorite.
customer_reviews.author: billsfan100

customer_reviews.title: Love the large font option
customer_reviews.text: Love the large font option!! Had Samsung Montage PayLo but couldn't find again. This one is easier to use, buttons and characters larger. Some people mentioned keyboard accidentally turns on when locked. Yes, I discovered this happens if the 9 or the # button is pressed. It doesn't go further than that, so no accidental calls. Overall love the phone and bought another for my husband. We only use text and talk so perfect for that. Cannot comment on other features.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle V Smith

customer_reviews.title: so far so good, like the keyboard
customer_reviews.text: so far so good, like the keyboard, and camera, got photos to laptop ok friends say the voice level is better and more understandable that my previous phone --free from assurance

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't buy this again
customer_reviews.text: I quit the service because the pohne was so bad. Speaker was awful and distorted sound, keyboard was hard to use (had to press right in the middle, or then again, sometimes to the left or right, to get the letters I wanted. Battery life short.
customer_reviews.author: Bean

customer_reviews.title: Great for $@20 but really an average phone.
customer_reviews.text: Great value for $20. They keyboard was so stiff when I first got it I may have given it only 2 stars but after a couple months, it's loosened up to rival the keyboards on more expensive phones. Good for people like myself who still can't text effectively on a touch screen. I keep my phone on silent all the time, but many of the phones default settings are annoying so you'll have to turn all of those off if you're a heavy phone user. I have my credit card on file an make a $20 payment each month.
customer_reviews.author: Andy Reese

customer_reviews.title: Rip OFF
customer_reviews.text: I had the most difficult time setting up/activating this account and would not recommend buying from this account. After purchasing, I found out that the same phone listed on Virgin Mobile is HALF this price; this account is trying to rip off folks for double the price. It's unfortunate that I didn't do my research better.
customer_reviews.author: Yee

customer_reviews.title: Economical Phone
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this phone, it was easy to hold and maneuver, especially the keypad. The only thing I didn't like is that it wasn't touchscreen like my current phone.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Gina
